article.title: Zel Technologies to Support DIA Science and Technology
article.text: Zel Technologies LLC of Hampton, Virginia, is being awarded a maximum $25 million indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract providing specialized services in science and engineering, business operation functions and other related services in support of the Defense Intelligence Agency’s (DIA) science and technology mission. The Virginia Contracting Activity, Washington, District of Columbia is the contracting activity (HHM402-14-D-0006).
